title: [BUG] Page.NavigationCacheMode="Enabled" breaks NavigationView in version 1809
body: In Windows version 1809, Navigating to a new page that has been created from a page within a NavigationView where Page.NavigatonCacheMode="Enabled", and then navigating back again causes the NavigationView to stop responding to NavigationViewItem clicks.  This works as expected in version 1803,
